title: Person Of Interest | Alternate Ending
author: Wishful Attempts
comment: This was one of the most intelligent tv shows I have ever seen. I will miss it very much.
Miss this damn good show. Reese was John Wick before John Wick.
Bring the damn show back!  --And we WANT the WHOLE CREW, include Root and Reese!!!!

This is the only fan video I have ever seen that struck me as a truly masterful addition to the original work. It's the smallest change, but it resonates more with the style and patterns in the show than the actual ending.  Great work.
Just wanted to say how truly grateful I am for all the positive feedback. THANK YOU for entrusting me with a bit of your time and feeling it was worth it! Really happy the video is being enjoyed :)
description:
» This is a humble video-edit pretending the events through Person of Interest’s s5e10 to s5e13 were all a simulation, a “game” set in Team Machine’s subway’s Faraday-cage. Both, the Machine and Samaritan, run their possible outcomes based on what they have learned since being operative and online. There are many ways the story could follow, this is only one of the countless possibilities. Hope you enjoy! ~

» It is only available on PC, neither mobile phones nor tablets will work, I’m really sorry for that!
